name: PrisimQuest(ProtoType)
description:
Prisim quest is a 2D RPG  and my first attempt at creating a game.

!!Important!!

play in full screen

(If you choose the staff (located in the starting areas second room first chest)

try pressing 1,2,3 and 4!)

East is to the right

West is to the Left

right mouse button to block. !!!Blocking in air sometimes causes game to crash!!!

!! left Ctrl regains mana !!

please let me know what you think!
